channel.title: Im confused :confused:
channel.description:
:confused:okay i need help
ive portforwarded many a time but the port i opened is not working anyway
im on the pc with the server on. i triy to connect to the server but not happening if i use "blababla.no-ip.biz" but it works fine with 127.0.0.1
any ideas????? btw the router is netgear if it helps :confused: :confused:

ermm new problem im on the main pc witch is conected to me router and it dosnt even work when im using my ip

im using vista
and the router is skys router not the netgear one the sky one

any one help me pplz

Read full topic

item.title: Im confused :confused:
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Do you have a firewall blocking connections? Windows Firewall, firewall on your anti-virus or Norton internet securety. Anything like that.

item.title: Im confused :confused:
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“masta XY, post:2, topic:252136”][quote author=biteme2 link=topic=332971.msg2596068#msg2596068 date=1229996886]
okay i need help

ive portforwarded many a time but the port i opened is not working anyway

im on the pc with the server on. i triy to connect to the server but not happening if i use “blababla.no-ip.biz” but it works fine with 127.0.0.1

any ideas??? btw the router is netgear if it helps
[/quote]

only othe people can connect to the server ip. only u can use the localhost, 127.0.0.1, and the 0.0.0.0[/quote]
You’re wrong. Anyone can connect to the No-IP. Even the person hosting the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Im confused :confused:
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

[quote=“biteme2, post:1, topic:252136”]okay i need help

ive portforwarded many a time but the port i opened is not working anyway

im on the pc with the server on. i triy to connect to the server but not happening if i use “blababla.no-ip.biz” but it works fine with 127.0.0.1

any ideas??? btw the router is netgear if it helps [/quote]

Well you can’t connect by your IP only people who WANT to play your server can…

You have to connect by a localhost witch that IP is 127.0.0.1 or no ip in at all…

Read full topic
